# Plotter.Function method

Plot a function

```csharp
public Plotter Function(Func<double, double> function, double start, double end, double step, 
    string title)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| function | function to plot |
| start | start value |
| end | end value |
| step | step |
| title | function title |

the current instance
